title: When You Attend A School When You Are Not Allowed To Cook
body:
There are some private institutions in Nigeria where you are not allowed to cook in the hostel and you cannot stay outside the hostel because staying in the hostel is a compulsory act.

body:
The mystery behind his death disturbed me even the more.  He died after eating the food my mother had kept for my father. 

Was the food poisoned?  Who could poison it,  could it be my mother?  Was she trying to kill my father?  I shuddered as those thoughts occupied my feeble head. 

The more I thought about it,  the more difficult it was for me to imagine that my father could kill my father. 
Why would she do that?  I shook off the idea.

But why did she behaves the way she did the day Osseo had died?  Why did she try to force him to vomit the food?  Was it because she knew it was poisoned?  Was that what really killed Osaro?
